Class PubVerbosityOption

java.lang.Object
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options.PubOption
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options.PubOptionWithValue<PubVerbosityOption>
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options.PubVerbosityOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
@PubGlobalOption public final class PubVerbosityOption extends PubOptionWithValue<PubVerbosityOption>
An global option that to determine level of the information will be displayed.

1.0.0
